name: letsmote.com
overview:
Letsmote.com is an anonymous emotional networking platform for Users to express their emotions and feelings. Letsmote.com was launched on 10th of May 2013.

The main features and goals of letsmote.com are:

• To get to the root of their problems and finding solutions to enhance and balance all aspects of their life – health, relationships, career and personal growth.

• To access intelligent reports and insights into your world of emotions; the sources of emotions, areas in life which are out of balance, and what one needs to focus on to be happy?

• To connect instantaneously (in private Circles of Trust) with other people around the globe facing similar set of challenges at this very moment.

• To get the right help, when they need it; whether it’s advice, a book, a video, a class, or taking the services of a life coach or a specific expert.

Letsmote.com’s mission and vision is to provide a fun, insightful tool for self-realization, self-development and self-growth and to give insights to users on dominant emotions, which affect their thought patterns and important relationships. Also, our goal is to use technology to enhance personal-development through Emotional Intelligence.
